cause.description:
We at All Health Natural know that kids are our future. With this as a common knowledge there are so many children who don't get the chances they deserve to live a normal, happy, healthly and safe life. Thats why we have created the Help the Kids cause. Donated proceeds will be directly donated to Goji Kids, Freelife International's signature charity group which to date has helped over 100 charities world wide echoing a changing impact in our world today. We wanna help make a difference and with you we can.
Try a case of Himalayan Goji Juice from www.allhealthnatural.net and partial proceeds from that sale will be donated to Goji Kids
1. To Help give every Child the same chances as every other child.
cause.mission: Collect donations to hold the First All Health Natural Childrens Charity Event
cause.name: Help the Kids - Try a Case - - Save a Child -
